participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is determined and resilient, shaped by his military experience. He values loyalty and hard work.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is ambitious and stylish, often seeking the finer things in life. She has a strong sense of individuality.
participant_2.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer.
